languages.text:
Выпускает поток огненных зарядов в количестве 4.
Каждый из них наносит 8-16 ед урона а так же накладывает Варп-горение 6.
С шансом 60% заряд полетит по прямой, а с шансом 40% отклонится в одну из сторон.

traits.locale_text:
Выпускает поток огненных зарядов в количестве 4.
Каждый из них наносит 8-16 ед урона а так же накладывает Варп-горение 6.
С шансом 60% заряд полетит по прямой, а с шансом 40% отклонится в одну из сторон.

languages.text: Unleashes a torrent of 4 flaming projectiles, each dealing <u>(from 8 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (6). The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.
languages.original_text: Выпускает поток из 4 огненных зарядов, каждый из которых наносит <u>(от 8 до 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (6). С шансом 60% заряд полетит по прямой, а с шансом 40% отклонится в одну из сторон.

traits.locale_text: Unleashes a torrent of 4 flaming projectiles, each dealing <u>(from 8 to 16)</u> damage and inflicting burning (6). The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.

Unleashes a torrent of 4 flaming projectiles, each dealing <u>(from 8 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (6). The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.

Unleashes a torrent of 4 flaming projectiles, each dealing <u>(from 8 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (6). The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.

languages.text: 4 alev topu yağdırır. Her biri <u>(8 ila 16)</u> puan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} (6) oluşturur. Alev topları %60 olasılıkla merkezî hat boyunca ilerler ve %40 olasılıkla da yan hatlardan birine saparlar.
languages.original_text: Unleashes a torrent of 4 flaming projectiles, each dealing <u>(from 8 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (6). The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.

traits.locale_text: 4 alev topu yağdırır. Her biri <u>(8 ila 16)</u> puan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} (6) oluşturur. Alev topları %60 olasılıkla merkezî hat boyunca ilerler ve %40 olasılıkla da yan hatlardan birine saparlar.

languages.text: Lanza una andanada de 4 proyectiles llameantes; cada uno inflige <u>(de 8 a 16)</u> puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y causa el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (6). Los proyectiles tienen un 60 % de probabilidad de surcar la línea central y un 40 % de probabilidad de desviarse por una de las líneas laterales.
languages.original_text: Unleashes a torrent of 4 flaming projectiles, each dealing <u>(from 8 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (6). The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.

traits.locale_text: Lanza una andanada de 4 proyectiles llameantes; cada uno inflige <u>(de 8 a 16)</u> puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y causa el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (6). Los proyectiles tienen un 60 % de probabilidad de surcar la línea central y un 40 % de probabilidad de desviarse por una de las líneas laterales.

languages.text: 射出4枚火焰弹，每枚火焰弹可造成<u>8-16</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，同时对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（6）效果。火焰弹有60%的几率沿着中心线飞行，有40%的几率偏离到其中一条侧线上。
languages.original_text: Unleashes a torrent of 4 flaming projectiles, each dealing <u>(from 8 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (6). The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.

traits.locale_text: 射出4枚火焰弹，每枚火焰弹可造成<u>8-16</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，同时对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（6）效果。火焰弹有60%的几率沿着中心线飞行，有40%的几率偏离到其中一条侧线上。

languages.text: Tire 4 projectiles enflammés qui infligent chacun <u>de 8 à 16</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (6). Les projectiles ont 60 % de chances de longer la ligne centrale, et 40 % de chances de dévier vers l'une des lignes latérales.
languages.original_text: Unleashes a torrent of 4 flaming projectiles, each dealing <u>(from 8 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (6). The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.

traits.locale_text: Tire 4 projectiles enflammés qui infligent chacun <u>de 8 à 16</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (6). Les projectiles ont 60 % de chances de longer la ligne centrale, et 40 % de chances de dévier vers l'une des lignes latérales.

languages.text: 4つの炎の弾丸の嵐を放ち、それぞれ<u>（8～16）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}火傷{/g}（6）を付与する。弾丸が中央線に沿って飛ぶ確率は60%、側線に逸れる確率は40%。
languages.original_text: Unleashes a torrent of 4 flaming projectiles, each dealing <u>(from 8 to 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (6). The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.

traits.locale_text: 4つの炎の弾丸の嵐を放ち、それぞれ<u>（8～16）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}火傷{/g}（6）を付与する。弾丸が中央線に沿って飛ぶ確率は60%、側線に逸れる確率は40%。

languages.text: Entfesselt 4 flammende Projektile, die jeweils <u>(8 bis 16)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursachen und {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (6) bewirken. Die Projektile haben eine Chance von 60 %, der zentralen Linie zu folgen, und eine Chance von 40 %, auf eine der seitlichen Linien abzuweichen.

The projectiles have a 60% chance to fly along the central line, and a 40% chance to deviate to one of the lateral lines.
